string-array.name: mcq_001
string-array.item: What is the musical precursor genre of Heavy Metal, that the list of great hits counts on Stairway to Heaven, Born to be Wild and Smoke in the Water?

string-array.name: mcq_002
string-array.item: What is the 70\'s band that is recognized by most as the creator of Heavy Metal?

string-array.name: mcq_003
string-array.item: What is the subgenre of Heavy Metal characterized by being influenced by jazz fusion and classical music as well as having conceptual albums and delving into a complex music technique and theory?
